DWFToolkit::DWF3DCamera

DWFToolkit::DWF3DCamera Class Reference

#include "dwf/presentation/DWF3DCamera.h"

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class convert W3DCamera to a directly-serializable one.

Since:
7.5

_DWFTK_API DWFToolkit::DWF3DCamera::DWF3DCamera (  const W3DCamera &  rCamera  )  throw () [inline]
 

Constructor For DWF3DCamera doesn't have any members of its own, if a W3DCemera will be convertd to DWF3DCamera, it's the best way to use this copy constructor
